title: Here is a title, finally

features.title: A range of options
features.description: All Pyrosaurus are made of rust-free stainless steel and have wings that fully extend and fold flat to the body. Adult Pyrosuarus is available with or without fire; also available with optional animation. Juvenile Pyrosaurus is available with or without fire. The Juvenile Delinquent (shown) breathes a 24 inch flame plume. Colossal Pyrosaurus is equipped with fire and is available as a stationary figure or with optional animation.

features.title: Fully designed and elegantly crafted
features.description: The Pyrosaurus are drawn from the artistâ€™s imagination and laser cut from original designs. Each Pyrosaurus is precision crafted and expertly welded, using heavy gauge stainless steel and top quality fittings for lasting quality.

features.title: Limited artist's production
features.description: The Pyrosaurus will be exclusively produced by the original artist in numbered limited edition.
